swa start -a .\angular-app\  --data-api-location swa-db-connections -w .\angular-app\ -r "npm start" 
swa start --api-location .\api\ --data-api-location swa-db-connections -w .\angular-app\

-a, --app-location <path>: the folder containing the source code of the front-end application (default: ".")
--data-api-location - folder containng the data api 
-w swaconfigfile location
--run custom shell commands to run

swa start -a .\angular-app\  --data-api-location swa-db-connections -w .\angular-app\ --api-location .\api\ -r "npm start"

swa start --api-location .\api\
